title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, I observe that the report design is storing the absolute path. For example, <property name="fileName">E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property>.
EB: The BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path when including a library in a report design. For example, if my report design is located at $project/test, the relative path should be stored as $project/test/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
